org.jetel.util.classloader

Class FilterClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • org.jetel.util.classloader.FilterClassLoader

  • public class FilterClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    ClassLoader to allow filtering of parent delegated class loading. By default all java.* and javax.* packages are delegated.

    • Constructor Summary
